author: Ubisoft
description:
Sam Fisher is back. TOM CLANCY'S SPLINTER CELL: DEATHWATCH available on October 14, only on Netflix.

From Derek Kolstad, the writer behind the John Wick franchise, comes the first-ever adaptation of the acclaimed stealth video game franchise, Tom Clancy’s Splinter Cell. After a long absence from the field, legendary agent Sam Fisher (Liev Schreiber) is drawn back into action when a wounded young operative (Kirby Howell-Baptiste) seeks his help. TOM CLANCY'S SPLINTER CELL: DEATHWATCH will be available worldwide on October 14 on Netflix.

About Ubisoft Film & Television

Ubisoft Film & Television’s mission is to bring Ubisoft’s award-winning games into new areas of entertainment and to create original stories set in the world, culture, and community of gaming. All four seasons of the division’s first original series, Mythic Quest, and spin-off anthology series Side Quest are available to stream globally on Apple TV+. The highly anticipated Splinter Cell: Deathwatch animated series will
title: Splinter Cell: Deathwatch | Official Teaser | Netflix

author: Ubisoft
description: Afeera is free for a limited time, and on sale as well! We're also releasing a Unique Execution for that Hero.
title: Afeera is free for a limited time!

author: Ubisoft
description:
Afeera is free for a limited time, and on sale as well! We're also releasing a Unique Execution for that Hero.

About For Honor:
Carve a path of destruction through the battlefield fighting for guts, glory, and survival in For Honor. Enter the chaos of a raging war as a Hero from some of the greatest warrior legacies ever known. For Honor is a fast-paced and immersive experience, mixing skill with visceral, never-before-seen melee combat.

Enjoy incredible seasonal content, engaging campaign and thrilling multiplayer with friends online, in split screen two-player co-op, or solo against AI.

#Ubisoft #ForHonor 

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, Th
title: For Honor: Content Of The Week - 21 August

author: Ubisoft
description:
Something ancient and forbidden is stirring in Jadame… Discover the long-hidden sixth faction and witness the rise of Schism, a force unlike any other.

Specializing in unavoidable damage and ability control, this mysterious faction adds a new layer of strategy, and chaos, to the battlefield.

Join us as we lift the veil and unleash powers from beyond.

Wishlist now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3105440/Heroes_of_Might_and_Magic_Olden_Era/

Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era is the new installment in the genre-defining, critically acclaimed series of turn-based strategy games.

Olden Era returns to the world of Enroth and the origins of the legendary saga, inviting both veterans and new players to go on a new strategic quest on Jadame, a mysterious continent in turmoil, mentioned but never explored in the previous games, with its unique factions, biomes and creatures.

Traverse a vibrant and living fantasy world full of wonders and dangers, build magnificent castles, raise mas
title: Heroes of Might and Magic: Olden Era - Schism Faction Teaser Trailer

author: Ubisoft
description:
Next season is just around the corner! It looks like True Sons, Hyenas and Outcasts are forging a pact and planning something huge. Gear up agents - we have no time to lose! The Division 2: The Pact starts on September 9th.

About The Division 2:
Tom Clancy's The Division 2 is a shooter RPG with a thrilling campaign fully playable in co-op and multiple PVP modes.

In The Division 2, save your country in Washington, DC, and in the Warlords of New York expansion, hunt down Aaron Keener, a former Agent who has taken control of New York.

#Ubisoft #TheDivision2

About Ubisoft:
Ubisoft is a creator of worlds, committed to enriching players’ lives with original and memorable entertainment experiences. Ubisoft’s global teams create and develop a deep and diverse portfolio of games, featuring brands such as Assassin’s Creed®, Brawlhalla®, For Honor®, Far Cry®, Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon®, Just Dance®, Rabbids®, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six®, The Crew® and Tom Clancy’s The Division®.
